info.description: API for managing immediate and scheduled tasks
info.title: JapaneseStudent Task API

get.description: Get paginated list of email templates with optional search filter. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

post.description: Create a new email template. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid request body or template creation failed

get.description: Get full email template information by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

delete.description: Delete an email template by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

patch.description: Update an email template (partial update). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid template ID or request body

get.description: Get paginated list of immediate tasks with optional filters (user ID, template ID, status). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

post.description: Create a new immediate task and enqueue it for processing. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid request body or task creation failed

get.description: Get full immediate task information by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

delete.description: Delete an immediate task by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

patch.description: Update an immediate task (partial update). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid task ID or request body

get.description: Get paginated list of scheduled task logs with optional filters (task ID, job ID, status). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).
get.summary: Get list of scheduled task logs

get.description: Get full scheduled task log information by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).
get.summary: Get scheduled task log by ID

get.description: Get paginated list of scheduled tasks with optional filters (user ID, template ID, active status). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

post.description: Create a new scheduled task with cron expression. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid request body or task creation failed

get.description: Get full scheduled task information by ID. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

delete.description: Delete a scheduled task by ID from database and Redis ZSET. Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

patch.description: Update a scheduled task (partial update). Requires admin role (JWT authentication).

400.description: Bad request - invalid task ID or request body

post.description: Create a new immediate task and enqueue it for processing. Requires API key authentication.

400.description: Bad request - invalid request body or task creation failed

post.description: Create a new scheduled task with cron expression. Requires API key authentication.

400.description: Bad request - invalid request body or task creation failed

delete.description: Delete all scheduled tasks for a specific user. Requires API key authentication.
delete.summary: Delete scheduled tasks by user ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Required for admin endpoints.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
